alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 26 at 12:50AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, northern Bay, southeastern Walton and Washington Counties through 130 AM EDT/1230 AM CDT/... At 1250 AM EDT/1150 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Chipley to 12 miles southwest of Vernon. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, Vernon, Chipley, Marianna, Bradford, Cottondale, Alford, Wausau, Ebro, Seminole Hills, Singer Road, Gulf Resort Beach, Bahama Beach, Holmes Valley, Gainer Spring, Sunnyside, Porter Lake, Vicksburg, Smyrna and Compass Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Jackson; Washington
